alert.note: Alert for Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester and southeastern Hampden Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Windsor, or near South Windsor, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Enfield, Vernon, Windsor, South Windsor, Southbridge, Ellington, Tolland, Windsor Locks, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, East Windsor, Sturbridge, Monson, Woodstock, Willington, Hampden, Warren and Bolton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
